cards.rules_text:
{W}{U} DESTINY Your creatures are meant for more. Seek their destiny and thrive.
{U}{B} TAPPING Your coven of witches can conjure powerful magic together through tap effects.
{B}{R} SPIRITS Call upon the Aos Si of the Otherworld and lead a Spirit army.
{R}{G} RAID Go forth, warrior, and conquer. Attack and reap the benefits.
{G}{W} ATTACK Lead an army and benefit when you attack with three or more creatures.
{W}{B} OATHS Your word is sacred. Stick to your sworn Oaths and be rewarded.
{B}{G} LIFEGAIN Seek immortality, or at least seek to outlast your opponents.
{G}{U} STRENGTH Only the strongest can reach the top. Focus on power 4 or greater and let might make right.
{U}{R} TACTICS Manage your attacks with support: Vehicles, abilities, and combat tricks will see you succeed.
{R}{W} GRAVEYARD The memories of the dead will lead you to victory; use your graveyard as a resource to win.
Solemn Caoineag gets +1/+0 as long as you’ve gained life this turn.
Whenever Hawthorn Witch becomes tapped, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
When Mournful Muse enters, each opponent discards a card.

Relentless Galloglas can’t block.
{2}{B}: Return Relentless Galloglas from your graveyard to the battlefield.
When An-Drim Brigand enters, it swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
{2}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life. Activate only if you own two or more cards in exile.
When Loathsome Dullahan dies, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

When Ar Dacha Bloodletter enters, it swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
Ar Dacha Bloodletter has menace as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.
When Monarch of Night enters, if you control two or more other Spirits, up to one target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
When Night-Wreathed Raider enters, if you’ve gained 3 or more life this turn, each opponent loses 3 life. Otherwise, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Tur Aun Rover enters with a +1/+1 counter on it as long as you’ve gained life this turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, you gain 1 life.
When Inspiring Brigand dies, create a 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature token.
[i]Raid[/i] — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you attacked this turn.
Duun Raider has haste as long as you control another creature with power 4 or greater.

When Handmaid of Cos Teilo enters, you gain 3 life.
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, add {G}. Until end of turn, you don’t lose this mana as step and phases end.

Trample
Whenever Ornery Badger becomes blocked, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
When Reclusive Druid enters, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token and a green artifact token named Mistletoe with “{1}, Sacrifice Mistletoe: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.”
When Wolftamer enters, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, then you gain 1 life for each Wolf you control.
{5}{G}: Hungry Forager gets +3/+3 until end of turn. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is the amount of life you’ve gain this turn. Activate only once each turn.
Trample, haste

Haste
{T}, Sacrifice Brash Upstart: Brash Upstart deals 1 damage to any target.
{2}, Exile Bloody Handed Novitiate from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 red and white Spirit creature token with “This creature can’t block.”
{R}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Roving Galloglas gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
When Barrow Watcher enters, if you control another Spirit, up to one target creature can’t block this turn.

Haste
[i]Raid[/i] — Fervent Raiders enters with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.
[i]Raid[/i] — {2}{R}: Canny Swordmaster gains first strike until end of turn. Activate only if you attacked this turn.

When Blade of Fehr Maun deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, Blade of Fehr Maun swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {2} or exile two creature cards from your graveyard.

Trample
[i]Raid[/i] — When Hand of the Black Horse enters, if you attacked this turn, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever Marsh Light becomes tapped, target creature you control gains ward {1} until the beginning of your next upkeep.

Flying
Whenever Honored Raven becomes tapped, scry 1.

Flash
When Lake Guardian enters, put two destined counters on target creature you control with destiny.
Unell’s Stag can’t be blocked as long as you control another creature with power 4 or greater.

Flying
Whenever Shoreline Shrieker becomes tapped, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
When An-Drim Tidecaller enters, untap up to two target creatures you control.
Scourge of the Seas can’t attack unless you control another creature with power 4 or greater.

Flying
When Keening Psychopomp enters, target Human gains indestructible until end of turn.
First strike

Flying
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, you gain 2 life.

When Proud Stalwart enters, it swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
First strike
Flash
{W}, Exile Placid Cattle from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

When Hero of Ar Dacha enters, it swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
Lifelink
Create two 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature tokens. You gain life equal to the number of creatures that attacked this turn.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, the creature you control with the least power swears an Oath.  [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)[/i]

Choose one —
• Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.
• Target creature you control swears an Oath [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can’t attack or block.
Tap any number of untapped creatures you control with total power 4 or greater: Exile enchanted creature.
Destroy target Spirit or enchantment.
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each counter on it.

Enchant creature
When Púca’s Blessing enters, draw a card.
Whenever a card you own is put into exile, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature. This ability triggers only once per turn.

At the beginning of your end step, if you control two or more untapped creatures, Oath of Penance is fulfilled.
When Oath of Penance is fulfilled, exile it and distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with creatures with total power 3 or more this turn, Oath of Purity is fulfilled.
When Oath of Purity is fulfilled, exile it and destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

Flash
When Guardian Fenoderee enters, untap target creature you control.
Whenever Aspiring Hero attacks, you may exile X cards from your graveyard, where X is Aspiring Hero’s power. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Aspiring Hero.

Flash
When Priest of Annan enters, prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. If damage is prevented this way and if you’ve fulfilled an Oath, Priest of Annan deals that much damage to any target.

cards.special_text:
Destiny [i](Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)[/i]
Whenever Fehr Maun Tactician attacks, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each destined counter on Fehr Maun Tactician.

cards.rules_text:
When An-Drim Cavalry enters, create a 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature token.
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, tap up to one target creature.

Create two 1/1 red and white Spirit creature tokens with “This creature can’t block.”
You may cast Legion of Annan from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs.
When Luth’s Prodigy enters, return target nonland permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Exile target tapped creature.

When Spirit Ring enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Spirit Ring leaves the battlefield.
{1}{W}, Exile Spirit Ring from your graveyard: You gain 3 life.

Whenever a creature you control dies, target creature you control swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)[/i]

Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equipment you control have “Equip—Tap two untapped creatures you control.”

At the beginning of your end step, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you do, Oath of Silence is fulfilled.
When Oath of Silence is fulfilled, exile it and target opponent can’t cast noncreature spells until your next turn.

Defender
Whenever a creature with flying enters, untap Sinister Bodach.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped creature you control or pay {1}.
Counter target spell.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, counter that spell unless its controller pays {4} instead.

Enchant creature
When Punishment of Seantas enters, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you do, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap step.

At the beginning of your end step, you have seen two or more cards while scrying this turn, Oath of Remembrance is fulfilled.
When Oath of Remembrance is fulfilled, exile it and draw two cards then discard a card.
Draw two cards, then discard a card unless you tap an untapped creature you control.
Return target creature to its owner’s hand. If it’s your turn, untap up to one target creature you control.
Untap target creature. It gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control.
Target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is 2 plus the total power of creatures tapped to pay for this spell.
Target nonland permanent you control phases out. Scry 1. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don’t exist until its controller’s next turn.)[/i]

When Salmon of Wisdom enters, scry 2.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice Salmon of Wisdom: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and draw a card.
Whenever Raven-Caller becomes tapped, create a 1/1 black Bird creature token with flying.

When Fehr Maun Dredger enters, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner’s hand. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, instead put that creature on top of its owner’s library.

Flying
Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, if it isn’t being declared as an attacker, Devouring Mist gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped creature you control.
Scry 2, then draw two cards.

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each creature you control with power 4 or greater. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner’s graveyard.
Tap an untapped creature you control: Target player mills a card.

Return target permanent to its owner’s hand.
Draw a card.

Enchant nonland permanent
Tap any number of untapped creatures you control with total power 3 or greater: Enchanted permanent phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don’t exist until its controller’s next turn.)[/i]
{2}, {T}: Put a game counter on The Great Game, then tap target nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to the number of game counters on The Great Game.

Choose one —
• Destroy target creature.
• Exile target planeswalker.
• Exile target player’s graveyard.
Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you have fulfilled an Oath, instead that creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
Target opponent sacrifices a creature or an enchantment. If you control two or more Spirits as you cast this spell, instead that player sacrifices a creature and an enchantment.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the exiled card’s power.

At the beginning of your end step, if a player lost 2 or more life this turn, Oath of Pilgrimage is fulfilled.
When Oath of Pilgrimage is fulfilled, exile it and you draw two cards and lose 2 life.

Choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. 
• Target creature you control swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)[/i]
Target player discards two cards. If they discard a creature card, create a 1/1 black Bird creature token with flying.
Until end of turn, target creature gains deathtouch and “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control.”
Spirits you control get +1/+1.
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Warmonger of Duun swears an Oath [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Rigann’s Scion and each opponent loses 1 life.

When Rigann’s Herald enters, choose one —
• Choose up to two nonlegendary Oaths you control. Those Oaths are fulfilled.
• Return target creature or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.special_text:
Destiny [i](Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)[/i]
When Unstoppable Cateran dies, if it had three or more destined counters on it, return it to the battlefield tapped.

cards.rules_text:
Menace
Whenever a non-Spirit creature would die, exile it instead.
Destroy target nonartifact, nonland permanent an opponent controls. You lose 2 life.

At the beginning of your end step, if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard, Oath of Resurrection is fulfilled.
When Oath of Resurrection is fulfilled, exile it and return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Equipped creature has deathtouch and “{T}, Tap an untapped land you control: Create a green artifact token named Mistletoe with “{1}, Sacrifice Mistletoe: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.”
Equip {2}
Target opponent reveals all but one of the cards in their hand. Choose a nonland card from among the revealed cards. That player discards that card.

At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal any number of cards from your hand with at least three different mana values. If you do, Oath of Storytelling is fulfilled.
When Oath of Storytelling is fulfilled, exile it and search your library for a card. Put that card into your hand and shuffle.

Choose one —
• Exile target player’s graveyard. That player loses life equal to the number of card types exiled this way.
• Remove all counters from target permanent. That permanent’s controller loses life equal to the number of counters removed this way.

At the beginning of your end step, if you have discarded two or more cards this turn, Oath of Celebration is fulfilled.
When Oath of Celebration is fulfilled, exile it and it deals 3 damage to target opponent.
Rise to the Occasion deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature’s mana value is 6 or greater, Rise to the Occasion deals 6 damage to it instead.
Becoming the Hound deals 2 damage to target creature. Gain control of that until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

Discard two cards, then draw three cards.
{2}, Exile Dreams of the Black Horse from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 red and white Spirit creature token with “This creature can’t block.”

Whenever equipped creature becomes tapped, if it isn’t being declared as an attacker, Weathered Claymore deals 1 damage to target player.
Equip {1}
Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Frenzy of Battle deals 1 damage to target player.

Exile target artifact.
[i]Raid[/i] — If you attacked this turn, Coastal Storm deals 2 damage to that artifact’s controller.
Whenever a creature blocks this turn, it deals 1 damage to itself. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Whenever Bog Swine becomes tapped, if it isn’t being declared as an attacker, up to one target creature can’t block this turn.
When Duun Cutpurse enters, discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.

Trample
Whenever Unell’s Charger attacks, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Unell’s Charger gets +1/+1 for each creature tapped this way.
Create four 1/1 red and white Spirit creature tokens with “This creature can’t block.”
Martial Sluagh has menace and trample as long as you control three or more Spirits.

Haste
As long as it’s not your turn, Wolf of Usraigh is a 1/3 Human Peasant.
Whenever Padraig, Bear of Tur Aun enters or attacks, you may exile three cards from your graveyard. When you do, Padraig deals 2 damage to any target.

When Sacred Menhir enters, it deals damage to target player equal to the number of Shrines you control.
Tap four untapped creatures you control: Create a token that’s a copy of Sacred Menhir.

At the beginning of your end step, if you control two or more tapped creatures, Oath of Destruction is fulfilled.
When Oath of Destruction is fulfilled, exile it and it deals 3 damage to each creature.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may exile three cards from your graveyard.
Choose target creature you control and target creature you don’t control. The creature you control gets +3/+1 until end of turn if the additional cost was paid. Then those creatures fight each other.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has first strike and “{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.”
Attacking Spirits you control get +1/+1.
Destroy target noncreature, nonenchantment permanent.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control, then that creature deals damage equal to its power to another target creature or planeswalker.

At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Oath of Might is fulfilled.
When Oath of Might is fulfilled, exile it and put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card and/or a land card from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Enchant creature
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, untap enchanted creature and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Enchant land
When Impenetrable Oaks enters, it deals 4 damage to up to one target creature with flying.
Enchanted land has “{T}: Add {G}{G}.”
[i]Raid[/i] — Put a land card onto the battlefield tapped. Then if you attacked this turn, untap that land.
Exile target artifact or enchantment.
Destiny [i](Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)[/i]
cards.special_text:
Destiny [i](Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)[/i]
{T}: Add {G}. If there are three or more destined counters on Roving Bard as you activate this ability, instead add three mana of any one color.

cards.rules_text: Whenever an opponent gains life, you gain half that much life, rounded down. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Whenever Ar Dacha Stalwart deals combat damage to a player, it swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on Wandering Raider.
Whenever Steed of Annan attacks, you may exile two cards from your graveyard. If you do, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

When Wild-Song Chanter enters, create three 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.
Whenever a creature enters under you control, you gain 1 life.

Haste
Hexproof from blue

Sacrifice An-Drim Exemplar: Until the beginning of your next end step, if one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature tokens are created instead.
Destroy target noncreature permanent.

Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
As long as you control eight or more lands, creatures you control have vigilance.

At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more creatures with power 4 or greater, Oath of Serenity is fulfilled.
When Oath of Serenity is fulfilled, create a 6/6 green Spirit Bear creature token.
Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

At the beginning of your end step, if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, Oath of Sorrows is fulfilled.
When Oath of Sorrows is fulfilled, exile it and return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

When Ominous Banshee enters, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Spirits you control.
Other Spirits you control get +1/+1.
Tap two untapped creatures you control: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Stag of High Tara.
{G}{U}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Stag of High Tara can’t be blocked this turn.
[i]Raid[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Unell’s Warleader and up to one other target creature.
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, create a 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature token that’s tapped and attacking.

When An-Drim Mourncaller enters, it swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
Whenever you fulfill an Oath, put a +1/+1 counter on An-Drim Mourncaller.

Flying
Whenever Otherworld Chariot becomes crewed for the first time each turn, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses that much life. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Sacrifice a creature: Fearr Gorta gains lifelink until end of turn.

When Howling Lamentation enters, you may discard up to two cards. If you do, draw that many cards.
{1}, Exile a creature card from a graveyard: Create a 1/1 red and white Spirit creature token with “This creature can’t block.”

Menace
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
Tap two untapped creatures you control: Untap target creature.

Haste
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

At the beginning of your end step, if you control two or more basic lands, Oath to the High King is fulfilled.
When Oath to the High King is fulfilled, create a 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature token.
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

Causeway Coast enters tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice Causeway Coast: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

High Tara enters tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice High Tara: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Otherworld Altar enters tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice Otherworld Altar: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Rugged Burren enters tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice Rugged Burren: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Overgrown Wreck enters tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice Overgrown Wreck: Search your library for a Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
When Ar Dacha Braggart enters, it swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]

At the beginning of your end step, if two or more creatures you don’t control died this turn, Oath of Vengeance is fulfilled.
When Oath of Vengeance is fulfilled, exile it and target player loses 1 life for each creature card in their graveyard.

Capal Dú, High King isn’t a creature unless you own two or more cards in exile.
Menace
Whenever an attacking creature you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Unell, the Wanderer  isn’t a creature unless you own two or more cards in exile.
You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.
Unell’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
When you have fulfilled an Oath, you can place the exiled card here.

Luth, Forge’s Fire isn’t a creature unless you own two or more cards in exile.
Skip your draw step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them this turn. Spell cast this way cost {1} less to cast.

Annan, Wry Voyager isn’t a creature unless you own two or more cards in exile.
Whenever another creature you control becomes tapped, put a wind counter on Annan.
{3}{U}, {T}, Remove X wind counters from Annan: Put target creature into its owner’s library just beneath the top X cards of that library. X can’t be zero.

Rigann, Thread Cutter isn’t a creature unless you own two or more cards in exile.
Whenever a creature you don’t control deals combat damage, put a fate counter on it.
{X}{X}, {T}: Destroy each creature with mana value X or less with a fate counter on it.

cards.special_text:
Destiny [i](Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)[/i]
Bard of Duun gets +3/+0 as long as it has three or more destined counters on it.

[+1]: Up to two target creatures you control each swear an Oath.
[-2]: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
[-5]: Each opponent loses 3 life for each Oath you’ve fulfilled.

cards.rules_text: Flying
This creature can’t block

Destiny [i](Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)[/i]
{T}: Draw a card. Activate only if Rigann’s Seer has three or more destined counters on it.

Destiny [i](Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)[/i]
Whenever Rigann’s Blackguard attacks, untap up to X target creatures you control, where X is the number of destined counters on Rigann’s Blackguard.

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature you control named Seantas, Hound of Ulaith dealt combat damage to an opponent this turn, Prophecy of the Hound is fulfilled.
When Prophecy of the Hound is fulfilled, exile it and target player loses the game.

When Seantas, Hound of Ulaith enters, destroy target non-Human creature.
Whenever Seantas attacks alone, you may exile an enchantment card from your hand. If you do, Seantas swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]

Whenever a creature enters, its controller chooses one. This ability triggers only once each turn.
• Each player draws a card.
• Cos Teilo, Generous King deals 2 damage to each player.
• Each player may put a +1/+1 counter on a creature they control.

cards.special_text:
Destiny [i](Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)[/i]
Sacrifice Luth’s Favored: You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of destined counters on Luth’s Favored.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, put a doom counter on target creature you control.
Creatures with doom counters on them deal damage to players in the form of poison counters. [i](A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)[/i]

Whenever a creature crews Black Coach, put a mortality counter on that creature. Do this only once each turn.
Whenever a creature you control with a mortality counter on it dies, return it to its owner’s hand at the beginning of the next end step.
Crew 3
{1}, Sacrifice Mistletoe: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Whenever a Warlock you control becomes untapped, each opponent loses 1 life.
Tap five untapped creatures you control: You may cast target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard without paying its mana cost. When you do, exile it when it resolves. Activate only as a sorcery.

At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent controls at least two more lands than you, Oath of Pursuit is fulfilled.
When Oath of Pursuit is fulfilled, exile it and destroy target land.

cards.special_text:
Destiny [i](Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)[/i]
Craven Haunter gets +1/+0 and has flying as long as it has three or more destined counters on it.

• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Remove all counters from target permanent.

Ciara, Blood Witch gets +1/+1 for each enchantment card you own in exile.

cards.rules_text:
The Oillipheist enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on The Oillipheist. Then if its power is 4 or greater, it gains ward {2} until the beginning of your next upkeep, and if its power is 8 or greater, it gains trample until the beginning of your next upkeep.

[i]Raid[/i] — {2}: Victorious Galloglas gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn and only if you’ve attacked this turn.
If a creature dealt damage by Victorious Galloglas this turn would die, exile it instead.

When Knight of Cos Teilo enters, it swears an Oath. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
Double strike
Each player who controls a creature with three or more counters on it draws a card, then destroy all creatures.

cards.rules_text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed
Queen of the Si gets +2/+2 as long as the top card of your library is a creature.
{1}{R}, Discard a card: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more creatures that don’t share a creature type, Oath of the Wilds is fulfilled.
When Oath of the Wilds is fulfilled, exile it and search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.special_text:
Destiny
Reaver of Tur Aun gets +1/+1 for each destined counter on it.
Sacrifice Reaver of Tur Aun: Return target permanent card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is Reaver of Tur Aun’s power. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if any player milled three or more cards this turn, Oath of Memory is fulfilled.
When Oath of Memory is fulfilled, exile it and target player mills half their library, rounded up.

[i]Raid[/i] — If you’ve attacked this turn, this spell can’t be countered, players can’t gain life this turn and damage can’t be prevented this turn.
Inexorable Assault deals 4 damage to any target.
Whenever you tap a basic land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap any number of untapped creatures you control.
Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the total power of creatures tapped this way. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Counter target spell. If a spell is countered this way, put it into its owner’s library just beneath the top X cards of that library, where X is the number of creatures you control with destiny.
Whenever Ciara’s Disciple becomes tapped, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to that card’s mana value.

At the beginning of your end step, you may pay 3 life. If you, Meaha’s Promise is fulfilled.
When Meaha’s Promise is fulfilled, exile it and destroy up to two target nonland permanents an opponent controls.

cards.special_text:
Destiny [i](Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)[/i]
[i]Raid[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, if you’ve attacked this turn, Naira, Vindictive Sluagh deals damage equal to the number of destined counters on it to any target.

cards.rules_text: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, creature you control get +1/+1 until end of turn and you draw a card.

You may have Siofra the Changeling enter as a copy of a creature on the battlefield, except it’s a Spirit in addition to its other types and it has “Tap three other untapped creatures you control: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.”

As long as Falniss, Fated Hound is attacking, prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.
Whenever Falniss becomes the target of a spell or ability, you gain 3 life.

Flying, first strike, haste
Whenever Ellein Trechend enters or attacks, you may exile three target cards from a single graveyard. If you do, it deals 3 damage to target player and you gain 3 life.

First strike
Tap another untapped creature you control: Put an aim counter on Fehr Maun Marksman.
{2}{W}, Remove two aim counters from Fehr Maun Marksman: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Flash
If you cast this spell during your main phase, it enters with a breach counter on it.
Shoreline Sovereign has ward {4} as long as it has a breach counter on it.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap three untapped creatures you control.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Balar, the Burning Eye enters with three omen counters on it.
Whenever Balar becomes tapped, remove an omen counter from it.
{T}: Balar deals 6 damage to target player. Activate only if there are no omen counters on Balar.

When Journey Home enters, create a 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature token.
At the beginning of your end step, target creature you control swears an Oath if it attacked this turn. [i](Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)[/i]
Your opponents can’t cast noncreature spells this turn. Up to one target nonlegendary Oath you control is fulfilled.
Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability unless its controller pays {2}

As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 3 life.
All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.
Until end of turn, creatures you control gain “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control. Sacrifice it at the beginning of its controller’s next end step.”
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may draw a card.

Sea’s Edge enters tapped.
When Sea’s Edge enters, untap target creature you control.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

Coastline Village enters tapped.
When Coastline Village enters, untap target creature you control.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

Midnight Dolmens enters tapped.
When Midnight Dolmens enters, untap target creature you control.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

High King’s Hall enters tapped.
When High King’s Hall enters, untap target creature you control.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

Apple Orchard enters tapped.
When Apple Orchard enters, untap target creature you control.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent controls a creature with power 4 or greater, Oath of Humility is fulfilled.
When Oath of Humility is fulfilled, exile it and exile target creature an opponent controls. That creature’s controller draws a card.

Enchant Spirit
When Across the Sea enters, target non-Spirit creature phases out. It can’t phase back in as long as you control enchanted creature. [i](Treat phased out permanents and anything attached to them as though they don’t exist.)[/i]

At the beginning of your end step, if you have 7 life or less,  Oath of Negation is fulfilled.
When Oath of Negation is fulfilled, exile it and it deals 3 damage to any target, you gain 3 life, and if a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
Sea’s Wrath deals 3 damage to each creature, each planeswalker, and each opponent.

Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control. For each point of excess damage dealt this way, return up to one target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Life Anew.
{T}: Add {C}. If that mana is spent on an enchantment spell, that spell can’t be countered.

At the beginning of your end step, if a legendary creature died this turn, Rigann’s Prophecy is fulfilled.
When Rigann’s Prophecy is fulfilled, exile it and search your library for a legendary creature card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

{T}: Add {C}.
{4}: Slumbering Hill becomes a 3/4 Giant creature until end of turn. It’s still a land.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Scry 1.

{1}, {T}: Put a destined counter on target creature. If that creature doesn’t have destiny, it gains destiny and “This creature gets +2/+2 as long as it has three or more destined counters on it.” [i](Whenever a creature with destiny becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)[/i]
If a triggered ability of another legendary permanent you control would trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

Whenever a creature dies, choose one —
• Exile that creature card from its owner’s graveyard. If you do, you gain life equal to its mana value.
• You may pay life equal to that creature’s mana value. If you do, return it to the battlefield tapped under your control.

Whenever a creature you control enters, you may have Fables of Unell become a copy of that creature until end of turn. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Fables of Unell. This ability triggers only once each turn.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. X can’t be zero.
Destroy each permanent with mana value X.

Target opponent takes an extra turn after this one. That player skips the combat phase of that turn.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, take an extra turn after that one. The first time you attack during that turn, untap all creatures you control and there is an additional combat phase after that phase.

Players can’t win the game unless a source they control has dealt combat damage to a player this turn.
Players can’t lose the game unless they have been dealt combat damage this turn.
Each creature you control has vigilance and can block an additional creature each combat.
